title: Blanin

properties.value: Blanin is Dron's brother, and is needed for information during the Making History quest. He can be found near the Dairy churn in Rellekka. He will give you information needed to have a successful conversation with Dron, which mainly focuses on his dietary habits.

Blanin

Advanced data
NPC ID3496

Blanin is Dron's brother, and is needed for information during the Making History quest. He can be found near the Dairy churn in Rellekka. He will give you information needed to have a successful conversation with Dron, which mainly focuses on his dietary habits.

During the quest, the first question Blanin asks is if Dron has killed a member of your family.

[[File:Blanin chathead.png|left]]
'''Blanin''' is [[Dron]]'s brother, and is needed for information during the [[Making History]] quest. He can be found near the [[Dairy churn]] in [[Rellekka]]. He will give you information needed to have a successful conversation with Dron, which mainly focuses on his dietary habits.

During the quest, the first question Blanin asks is if Dron has killed a member of your family.

{{Rellekka}}
{{Making History}}
